text: Discover your voice.

woman: 
We have six young ladies

who have come together
to produce a film
for Hispanic Heritage Month.

My name is Edith.
I get really nervous

in front of cameras.
All right, guys, let's start.

But when I dance,
all those nerves go away.

- Hi, guys.
- all: Hi.

My name is Raquel Farinas,
and I am a parade performer.

I'm really excited to see
what you guys have done.

If you're going through
something tough,

show that through your dance.
You guys are all Latinas.

That's something
that's so powerful.

Edith: I connected when she said
that she got rejected a lot

of times, but she kept on trying
and trying.

She taught me to just
loosen up.

- And cut.
- Scroll to a part of your video

- you really liked.
- My name is Fernanda,

and I took on the task
of editing.

It was really fun
collaborating with these girls.

I learned that I can do a lot
more than I thought I could.

It was really cool.
It was an amazing experience.
all: Girl power!
Descubre tu voz.

Follow their journey.
Discover your voice.

Hispanic Heritage Month
on Disney Channel.
